DataElement.preferredName: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Assessment Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded yes/no/not applicable indicator relating to the ECOG performance status of a patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the ECOG performance status.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) was established in 1955. This is a cooperative group (Philadelphia, PA) funded primarily by the NCI, one of the largest clinical cancer research organizations in the US, incorporating universities, medical centers, Community Clinical Oncology Programs, and Cooperative Group Outreach Programs with almost 6000 physicians, nurses, pharmacists, statisticians, and clinical research associates from the US, Canada, and South Africa. ECOG has more than 90 active clinical trials in all types of adult malignancies. Annual accrual is 6,000 patients, with more than 20,000 patients in follow-up.:A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.

Concepts.definition: A cooperative group funded primarily by the NCI, one of the largest clinical cancer research organizations in the US, incorporating universities, medical centers, Community Clinical Oncology Programs, and Cooperative Group Outreach Programs with almost 6000 physicians, nurses, pharmacists, statisticians, and clinical research associates from the US, Canada, and South Africa. ECOG has more than 90 active clinical trials in all types of adult malignancies. Annual accrual is 6,000 patients, with more than 20,000 patients in follow-up.
A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.

Property.preferredDefinition: Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is Zubrod performance status 0, 1 or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 60%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is ECOG performance status 0
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0 or 1 and has an estimated life expectancy of greater than 3 months?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0 or 1 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 70%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1 or 2?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0 or 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0 or 1 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 80%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1, or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 50%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, or 1 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 60%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status less than or equal to 2 (Karnofsky or Lansky greater than or equal to 70%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1 or 2 (Patients greater than or equal to 16 years of age must have a Karnofsky performance level of greater than or equal to 70%) and children less than 16 years old must have a Lansky performance of greater than equal to 70%?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1 or 2 or Karnofsky greater than 50% (if greater than or equal to 16 years of age); or children less than 16 years old must have a Lansky performance of greater than or equal to 50%?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1 or 2 or Karnofsky greater than or equal to 60% if patient is  greater than 16 years of age; or Lansky greater than or equal to 60% if patient is less than or equal to 16 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status less than or equal to 1 or Karnofsky greater than or equal to 70%?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1, or 2 (Karnofsky or Lansky greater than or equal to 70%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1, or 2 (Karnofsky greater than 60%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1, or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 70%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is in Phase 1, is ECOG performance status 0 or 1 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 70%) or if in Phase 2 ECOG performance status is 0, 1, or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 60%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1 or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 60%) if patient is greater than or equal to 16 years of age; or Lansky greater than or equal to 50% if patient is less than 16 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0 or 1 (Karnofsky greater than 60%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG-ACRIN performance status 0, 1 or 2?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is less than or equal to 16 years old is Lansky play score greater than or equal to 50%; if patient is greater than 16 years old is Karnofsky performance status greater than or equal to 50%?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have ECOG performance status of 0, 1, or 2?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled to Arm B, is ECOG performance status 0, 1 or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 50% if patient is greater than 16 years old)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1, 2 or 3?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1, or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 60%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 25
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1, or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 80%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 26
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1 or 2 if patient is greater than or equal to 16 years of age; or Lansky greater than or equal to 50% if patient is less than 16 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 27
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status less than or equal to 1 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 70%)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 28
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is ECOG performance status 0, 1 or 2 (Karnofsky greater than or equal to 50%)?
